logo.name: AutoBoost Parts Logo
logo.description: A sleek and modern logo representing AutoBoost, infusing elements of automotive and speed.

sections.title: Welcome to AutoBoost Parts
sections.subtitle: High-Quality Car Parts at Unbeatable Prices
sections.name: landing_hero
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Looking for reliable car parts? **AutoBoost Parts** offers a wide range of high-quality components to get you back on the road. Start exploring our catalog today!

images.name: Car Parked in a Garage
images.description: Image of a sleek car parked in a well-organized garage, embodying precision and quality.

sections.title: About Us
sections.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Automotive Parts
sections.name: about_us
sections.label: About
sections.content: Established in 2005, **AutoBoost Parts** has committed to delivering only the best automotive components to our customers across the globe. Our mission is to ensure your vehicle gets the best in terms of reliability and performance. **Why Choose Us?** * Over 15 years of experience in the industry * Extensive collection of parts for all vehicle models * Unparalleled customer service and support

images.name: Company Growth Chart
images.description: A graph showing the growth and success of AutoBoost Parts over the years.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.subtitle: Quality Parts, Guaranteed Performance
sections.name: our_services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
At **AutoBoost Parts**, we provide a vast array of automotive components and services. 

- **Engine Parts**: Enhance your engine's efficiency with our top-notch products.  
- **Brake Systems**: Ensure safety with our advanced braking systems.  
- **Transmission Parts**: Optimize your vehicle's performance with our tailored components.

images.name: Engine Components Display
images.description: A variety of engine parts displayed, showcasing diversity and availability.

sections.title: Customer Testimonials
sections.subtitle: Hear From Our Satisfied Clients
sections.name: customer_testimonials
sections.label: Testimonials
sections.content:
**What Our Customers Say**

- *"AutoBoost Parts transformed my car's performance completely. Exceptional quality and great customer service!"* — Alex T.  
- *"Their prices are unbeatable. My go-to place for car parts."* — Linda M.

images.name: Customer with Car
images.description: A happy customer standing by their well-maintained car.

sections.title: Product Gallery
sections.subtitle: Explore Our Extensive Range of Products
sections.name: product_gallery
sections.label: Gallery
sections.content: Take a look at the variety of products we offer. Whether you're looking for something specific or just browsing, our gallery displays the comprehensive selection we can provide.

images.name: Auto Parts Display
images.description: A detailed view of various auto parts in stock at our store.

sections.title: Get in Touch
sections.subtitle: We're Here to Help!
sections.name: contact_us
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
Need assistance or have a question? Contact us through any of the following channels:

- **Phone**: 1-800-555-BOOST  
- **Email**: support@autoboostparts.com  
- **Visit Us**: 123 Main St, Springfield  

Our friendly team is ready to assist you at any time!

images.name: Store Location Map
images.description: Map highlighting the location of AutoBoost Parts store in Springfield.

sections.title: Latest News
sections.subtitle: Stay Updated with AutoBoost Parts
sections.name: latest_news
sections.label: News
sections.content:
Catch up with the latest updates from AutoBoost Parts including product launches, discounts, and automotive tips. 

- **New Arrivals**: Exciting new parts added to our collection!  
- **Monthly Deals**: Check out our special offers each month.

images.name: Special Offer Banner
images.description: A visually appealing banner promoting the latest offers and discounts.

sections.title: Meet Our Team
sections.subtitle: The People Behind AutoBoost Parts
sections.name: meet_our_team
sections.label: Team
sections.content: Our dedicated team of professionals is what makes AutoBoost Parts exceptional. Trust in their expertise and dedication to bring you only the best in automotive parts and service.

images.name: CEO John Smith
images.description: A headshot of John Smith, the CEO of AutoBoost Parts.

sections.title: FAQs
sections.subtitle: Common Questions Answered
sections.name: faq
sections.label: FAQ
sections.content:
**Frequently Asked Questions**

- *Can I order custom parts?* — Yes, we provide custom orders upon request.  
- *What is your return policy?* — Easy returns within 30 days of purchase.

images.name: Question Mark Icon
images.description: An icon representing frequently asked questions.

sections.title: Call to Action
sections.subtitle: Start Your Journey with Us Today
sections.name: call_to_action
sections.label: Start Now
sections.content: Ready to enhance your vehicle's performance? **Explore our collection** now and enjoy **10% off your first purchase**. Use code: BOOST10 at checkout.

images.name: Discount Badge
images.description: An eye-catching badge promoting the special discount offer for new customers.
